member.summary: Get current orderbook for open buy and sell orders for the given market on the selected exchange.

member.name: M:MarketsInterface.Controllers.MarketsController.Volume(System.String,KassandraWebTest.Kassandra.Exchanges)
member.summary: Get the volume for a given market. If an exchange is passed the volume for the given exchange will be returned.

Exchange from supported exchange list to retrieve data from.
